com.cloudmonitor24.sdk

Class CloudMonitor24

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudmonitor24.sdk.CloudMonitor24

  • public class CloudMonitor24
extends java.lang.Object
    CloudMonitor24 class allows cloud logging of variables and alarms
    It requires a valid application context, a plant identifier and a plant token
    A background service (DataSenderService) is helpful to store data persistently in case of a temporary lack of connectivity
